oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Present practice, on-going research and future potential for non-chemical pest management in fruit and berry production in Denmark

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Production systems

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Workshop prensentation - Present practice, ongoing research and future potential for non-chemical pest management in fruit and berry production in Denmark. Chinese-Danish networking on systemic approaches to pest management without pesticides. Hand-out (Flowerstrips and beneficials in orchards)
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Sigsgaard, Lene (2012) Present practice, on-going research and future potential for non-chemical pest management in fruit and berry production in Denmark. University of Copenhagen, Department of Plant and Environmental Sciences.
